label: 笈
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: according to Kaempfer, the yamabushi's pouch for personal belongings; otherwise described as a box with a small door and legs, to stand up when put down, carried on the back by yamabushi and other religious [山伏]
